about_the_game:
MSCR is Top down-shooter game, the story mainly revolves around EMET, a combat android and the YAD the company producing these androids
the gameplay mainly consist of shooting enemies, discovering the map, and using abilities to progress
the game progress will be something close to Metroidvania games, you will have the ability to revisit the rooms you already cleared
for reasons like backtracking because you'll find some things changed, either new enemies or new rewards or even new routes...
throughout the whole game you will have one weapon which is your gun, but you'll also acquire abilities that gives you special attacks and also grant you the ability to progress on the game or increase your resistance to bullets or your health recovery time...etc
you'll explore the whole building of YAD, which is not a small place, at the first glance it looks like a very normal corporation building, but diving deep into it you'll discover more hidden secrets, and you will know why they're hidden.

the game name (MSCR) is pronounced "MASSACRE".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Control EMET, a highly advanced Combat Android produced by YAD, a Military Technologies company working for the government, the android was made for tyrannical purposes, but thanks to a mysterious event, your mission now is to bring justice to the world
